Swati: Ekucaleni kwemphi ngalokuvamile beyihamba ngetulu kwelwandle, kodvwa nakucalwa kwakhiwa intfo letsite lebona indlela, sigaba nelitubane umkhumbi lohamba ngalo futsi ishaya khona, imikhumbi lehamba ngephansi yaphoceleleka kutsi ihambe ngephansi kuze ingabonwa. 
English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

Swati: Kuphumula etulu kuyinye yetintsaba tasenyakatfo yeMecca, lomhume ukhashane kuletinye tindzawo emhlabeni. 
English: The Turkish navy was the most advanced in the world at the time, and the submarines were very powerful.
